testcase.name: To verify the login functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user has to launch the chrome browser and hit the url of facebook.....passed When user has to enter the username and password............................passed And click the login button..................................................passed

testcase.name: To validate the create new account
testcase.system-out: Given user has to launch the chrome browser and hit the url of facebook.....passed When click create new account button........................................passed And user has enter the first name and last name.............................passed And user has to enter the mobile num or password............................passed And user has to enter the new password......................................passed And user has to select date of birth........................................passed And user has to click gender................................................passed
